document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Gyllenhal, L. (1839) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Biology. Mountain slopes, forests, gardens. Adults occur in V–IX. On
Betula
spp.,
Alnus
spp. ( Betulaceae ),
Malus
spp. ( Rosaceae ),
Salix
spp., sometimes
Populus
spp. ( Salicaceae ) ( Lavrukh 1971 ; Dieckmann 1974 )
